overview:
A Cloud Computing based Complete Suite of Medical Billing, Practice Management, EHR, eRx & Practice Portal.

PracticeSuite is a Cloud based software company that offers a comprehensive suite of Practice Scheduling, Medical Billing and Electronic Health Record Software http://www.practicesuite.com
